attributes.action: Abolish planning consent for House to flat conversions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to abolish planning consent for house to flat conversions, to double up accomodation, drop prices in a dynamic and changing social need based market, a precursor to reviews of development plans, would help drop house prices if done with conversion grants, doubling up all the capacity because the uks social fabric is changing from the 2.5 nuclear family could be done with an SI, if done cleverly could seriously reduce accomodation prices in the south, Masons currently distort the market with thier mickey mouse applications
